1 Overview

2 The Packages

  • Packages
  • Code
Package Usage
olsrr For building OLS and performing diagnostics tests. Enhances the capabilities of the basic linear modeling functionality and provides a comprehensive set of regression diagnostics, model comparisons, and other statistics, including normality of residuals, homoscedasticity, and influential observations.
GWmodel For calibrating geographical weighted family of models
corrplot For multivariate data visualisation and analysis, particularly to visualise correlation matrix.
ggpubr For some easy-to-use functions for creating and customizing ‘ggplot2’- based publication ready plots.
sf For spatial data handling.
tmap Choropleth mapping; thematic maps
tidyverse Attribute data handling
gtsummary Summarises data sets, regression models, and more, using sensible defaults with highly customisable capabilities.
DT, knitr, kableExtra For building tables 
pacman::p_load(olsrr, GWmodel, corrplot, 
               ggpubr, sf, spdep, 
               tmap, tidyverse, gtsummary,
               DT, knitr, kableExtra)

3 The Data
